traits.name: Divine Smite
traits.desc: When the slayer hits with a melee weapon attack, it can expend a spell slot to deal an addition 9 (2d8) radiant damage, in addition to the weapon's damage.

traits.name: Dueling Fighting Style
traits.desc: The slayer gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls while wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons (included in the attack).

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The slayer is a 3th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The slayer has the following paladin spells prepared: * 1st level (3 slots): bane, cure wounds, searing smite

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lay on Hands (1/Day)
actions.desc: The slayer touches a creature and restores 20 hit points to it.
